user.title: Configure SMS.to
user.description: Enter the API key and sender ID to configure SMS.to notifications.

test_message.title: Test Message
test_message.description: Enter a phone number to send a test message and verify the integration functionality.

error.invalid_api_key: The provided API key is invalid. Please enter a valid API key.
error.invalid_sender_id: The provided sender ID is invalid. Please enter a valid sender ID.
error.invalid_test_number: The test phone number is invalid. Please enter a valid number.
error.test_message_failed: Sending the test message failed. Please check the configuration and try again.

abort.already_configured: This account is already configured. Update the existing integration if necessary.

notify_smsto.name: SMS.to Notification
notify_smsto.description: Send an SMS notification via SMS.to.

message.name: Message
message.description: The notification text to be sent. This field is required.

title.name: Title
title.description: Notification title (optional). It will appear above the message text.

target.name: Recipient
target.description: A list of phone numbers to which the notification will be sent. Each number must be in international format.

data.name: Additional Data
data.description: Platform-specific additional data such as a callback URL or priority level.

init.title: Modify SMS.to Settings
init.description: Update the API key or sender ID for SMS.to notifications.

error.invalid_api_key: The updated API key is invalid. Please verify and try again.
error.invalid_sender_id: The updated sender ID is invalid. Please verify and try again.
